alert.note: Alert for Houston; Winona (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 10 at 2:12PM CST by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact counties along the Mississippi River through 315 PM CST... At 209 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles northwest of Mondovi to near Brownsville to near Masonville. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Brownsville around 215 PM CST. Stoddard around 220 PM CST. Coon Valley around 235 PM CST. Westby around 245 PM CST. Cashton around 255 PM CST. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
